ratings.comment: I'll be honest, I have not attended lecture since the middle of the semester since it is just that much of a waste of my time. Frank teaches as though you already know the material and uses obscure physics references as examples that are irrelevant to any test material. With Frank, your only hope is to have a decent TA and grind out past exams.

Math 320: Worst proffesor Ive ever had. I am very good with calculus and mathematics in general and he would go so fast that I couldn't pick up on anything. Makes many mathematical errors in lectures causing for more confusion. Added more units to exams than the usual course would. Get ready to teach yourself the course. Discussions are helpful.

MATH320: He fails to adequately teach the material in class doing examples beyond the scope of the tests after explaining the base concept for only the first 5 min of class. You are better off just using the internet or going to another lecture. Discussions are very helpful for MATH 320

He is not a good lecturer. He goes so quick and assumes everyone understands. He goes from step 1 to the answer and doesn't explain. The lectures have nothing to do with what we are learning. He just teaches so fast no one has time to write everything down.
